awards.title: Best Paper Award
awards.summary: Received the Best Paper Award for ransomware defense research using Game Theory and Strategic Deception.

projects.name: Dolus - Defense By Pretense
projects.summary: Network security framework that leverages quarantine and deception to defend against DDoS and Advanced Persistent Threat/Mining.

projects.name: Fintech Blockchain (ClaimChain)
projects.summary: Blockchain for ensuring security for insurance claims processing at application and infrastructure level encompassing fraud detection, cyber threat detection

projects.name: Smart Grid Blockchain (SGChain)
projects.summary: Hyperledger Fabric-based chain-of-chain blockchain for secure and efficient energy trading in smart grids with robust security framework for loss of availability issues in Smart Grids.

projects.name: Ransomware Game Theory
projects.summary: Game theory-based strategic deception for ransomware defense using backward induction to solve a complete and extensive game.

projects.name: CIBR-Fort
projects.summary: Knowledge-driven threat modeling, analysis and mitigation framework for smart grids integrating security and power knowledge graphs powered by LLM and RAG models.

projects.name: Arculus
projects.summary: Task-Based Access Control for Computation and Communication and AI-driven drone mission recovery in the Tactical Warfighting Edge.
